definition: to take/to borrow/to pick (flowers, fruit etc)/to pluck/to select/to remove/to take off (glasses, hat etc)
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: The TVC is based on the girl's notes and jottings about her travels.
sentences.chinese: 電視廣告是一個女孩的旅行摘記。

sentences.english: A comment is a private note for staff not visible to the requestor.
sentences.chinese: 註釋是一個對請求者不可見的給員工的隱祕的摘記。

sentences.english: this passage is taken from wuthering heights.
sentences.chinese: 這一段摘記自《呼嘯別墅》。

sentences.english: Write out all of the notes that you need to remember over and over again.
sentences.chinese: 寫出全部的摘記，你必須一遍又一遍地記住它們。
